tool_description:
Make your onboarding process safer, faster, and smarter by verifying the legitimacy of the MSME merchants operating in the manufacturing or service sectors, on your platform.

With IDfy’s Udyam Aadhaar verification API, you can now confidently onboard merchants knowing that the merchant exists, is genuine and is authorized to partake in the manufacture or service sector by the Ministry of MSME.
name: Udyam Aadhaar Verification
title: Udyam Aadhaar Verification

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Get call is to be made by appending request id to the url in the query parameter, to fetch the api results.
